note:
Risk averse, Mamma (not mom), friend. Believe in care and courage, love, kindness & persistent rage. A sucker for good food, good wine, live jazz, and a beautifully crafted sentence. Usually willing to shake my moneymaker. Probably checking out your shoes. I'm trying to be a better person every day - failing frequently. Blackety black
